name: fae noblewoman
job_description: I'm in charge of the faeries of my court.

dynamic_line: I came here with my court when the Hedge between our worlds thinned and the border marches expanded.  They came for conquest and I came here for coexistence.

responses.text: So you're a good faerie?
How can I join your court?
Is there anything I can do for you?
I am ready to leave this world for yours.
I'd like some advice about the Jabberwock.
I'd like some advice about the march lords.
I'd like some advice about that dog.
I'd like some advice about the giant acid queen ant.
I'd like some advice about the armored centipede.
I'd like some advice about the automaton.
I'd like some advice about the triffid heart
I'd like some advice about the titan stag beetle
I'd like some advice about the shadow and its piece
I'd like some advice about the star-crowned hound
I'm back and I killed the Jabberwock.  [Give her the heart]
I'd better get going.

dynamic_line: Some of my kind might find that word pejorative, but it's what you've called us for so very long.  It had been quite a while since we were last able to come in numbers to this world, until the last few years.

responses.text: Why were you able to return?
How can I join your court?
Well those of us who aren't faeries have other places to be now.

dynamic_line: The same thing that is causing the portal storms made travel between our worlds easier again.  We have to engage in fairly strenuous decontamination procedures on our way back but we've had those in place for aeons.

responses.text: Decontamination?  You can leave here and not worry about the risen dead?
How can I join your court?  I want to leave here when you do!
I'm going to head on now.

dynamic_line: If we die here, we will rise just like you, we are within the belly of the beast, so to speak here.  But yes when we go elsewhere we don't bring this with us, that would be rude.

responses.text: Please take me away with you.
I haven't decided if I believe you or not but I'll see you around.

dynamic_line: Well you can't just join by asking, you need to accomplish a series of progressively more difficult quests, bringing me trophies and relics proving your worth to join our ranks.

responses.text: Do you have a quest for me now?
I'm going to head on now.

dynamic_line.yes: I have no new quests for now.  Once you'll have completed them, you'll become part of my court and allowed to move offworld when you will wish so.

no.yes: (Boann hands you a list) Here is a list of the quests to complete to become part of my court.  They are very difficult, but their rewards will be worth it.
I have no new quests for now.  Once you'll have completed them, you'll become one of my knights and able to accomplish the quests that will make you a member of my court.
no.no: (Boann hands you a list) Here is a list of the quests to complete to become one of my knights.  Take your time, they can be accomplished when you want.

responses.text: And when I'll be a knight you'll bring me out of here?
[Bring me the heart of a Jabberwock]
[Find and kill three March Lords]
[Kill the suspicious dog]
[Kill a giant acidic queen ant]
[Kill an armored centipede]
[Kill the remains of a dreamforged automaton]
[Bring me back a chunk of a triffid heart]
[Kill a titan stag beetle]
[Bring me back a piece of the darkest shadow]
[Kill a star-crowned hound]
I'm going to head on now.

dynamic_line: You won't be a member of my court yet.  After another few quests, you will, and you along with all those that follow you will be brought out of this world whenever you wish so.

responses.text: Can I see the quest list again?
I'm going to head on now.

dynamic_line: Kill a great beast in my honor and I'll reward you.  Prove to me that you have the heart of a knight.  Bring me the putrid heart of a Jabberwock.

responses.text: I'll do it.  Where's the Jabberwock?
Do you have any advice?
I'm not sure if I want to do it.  See you.

dynamic_line: You will need incredible melee skills to handle this or an impressive gun.  Otherwise it do not have hidden tricks or notable intelligence so it'll be a straightforward fight.

responses.text: I'll do it.  Where's the Jabberwock?
Can I see the other quests first?
I'm not sure if I want to do it.  See you.

dynamic_line: I had no doubts in you.

responses.text: Can I see the other quests?
Do you have any advice?
I'm going to head on now.

dynamic_line: I'm pleased to grant you a Melian mount of your own.

responses.text: Can I talk about something else?
Thank you.
